titleStmt.title: A serious addresse to Samuel Oates, for a resolve in some few quære's touching his new-baptisme & ministry. Also a short and faithfull word of Christian advice to those of his church in Lincolnshire, concerning their way, and that spirit by which they are led. Together with a brief and plain evidence of the ground for baptizing a believers infant-seed. / By John Drew, a servant of Jesus Christ.
titleStmt.author: Drew, John, fl. 1649-1651.
